EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance: We'll pay your way into the 2020 Hunger Walk-Run
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default= }}
The sign up link has been fixed! We apologies to those who attempted to sign up yesterday and experienced problems with the link. Don't worry, you still have today to get your name on the list!
How can you make a positive impact on our community? Join Team NCR for the 2020 Hunger Walk-Run! Today is the last day to sign up! The annual event benefits the Atlanta Community Food Bank, and as a thanks for being one of our best customers, we're covering your registration fees. All you have to do is RSVP below and we will make sure you have a spot on March 15.
See you there! What? 2020 Hunger Walk-Run
When? Sunday, March 15 12:00pm – 4:00pm (registration and entertainment begins at 12:00pm)
Where? The Home Depot Backyard at Mercedes-Benz Stadium ${Button-Text} <[[${Button-Link}]]> Please do not forward this exclusive invite.
